Steps.Description: Use Trick
If opponent uses Night Slash, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
If opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Bronzong/Exeggutor, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol/Flareon, then switch to Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Empoleon, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick
If opponent uses Fire Blast
Switch immediately into Chandelure Calm Mind
If opponent does not swap out, x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
If opponent switches out into Empoleon while you set up, immediately switch to Poliwrath then switch to the second Metagross Trick
If opponent switches back into Altaria, switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
If opponent does not swap out, switch back to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Fire Flamethrower
Switch into Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Clefable
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Lucario.
Switch into Chandelure x5 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick
Opponent switches into Exeggutor. Switch to Blissey and use Softboiled.
If opponent switches into Absol, switch into Chandelure x4 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch into Chandelure then use Flamethrower to kill Empoleon. Switch into Blissey and use Softboiled

If opponent switches into Flareon, switch into Chandelure x3 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Use Stealth Rock

Use Stealth Rock
Switch to Chandelure ×2 Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
